name: Envelope (DAHDSR)
description: This algorithm is based on the disting EX “Quad Envelope” algorithm. You may like to review the [video on that algorithm, which is here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PIRCsGBi8Es) [67] . It is a complex (DAHDSR) envelope generator. Various trigger modes include gated, triggered (oneshot) and looping. The envelopes can be synced to clocks (analogue pulses, or MIDI).

parameters.name: Shape
parameters.description: Chooses the shape used by the envelope generator.

parameters.name:
Clock
source
parameters.description: The clock source, one of ‘Input’ or ‘MIDI’.

parameters.name:
MIDI
divisor
parameters.description: The MIDI clock divisor, if the source is MIDI.

parameters.name: Scale
parameters.description: The magnitude of the output envelope.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: The offset (starting/ending value) of the envelope.

parameters.name: Vel -> scale
parameters.description:
The amount by which the trigger velocity affects the

attack
